metadata.title: CVE-2023-41361 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in FRRouting FRR 9.0. bgpd/bgp_open.c does notcheck for an overly large length of the rcv software version.

criterions.comment: quagga: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
